description:
Simple PodCatcher is a basic yet elegant podcatcher designed to manage your podcast content easily.
Amongst basic playback functionality, Simple PodCatcher features a sophisticated three column layout. One contains the podcast list, another displays episodes currently available (for a selected feed) and the latter column clearly displays podcast episode descriptions. Multiple feeds are also supported within this simple design and can conveniently be searched while playing. The integrated podcast finder gets you going quickly.
Simple PodCatcher is available for free download. For additional features such as downloading episodes, creating playlists, filtering and much more try PodCatcher Deluxe and Video PodCatcher Deluxe. See http://www.podcatcher-deluxe.com for more information.
This software is available in English, German, French, and Spanish.
